key.name: prompt-check-if-default-mailer
key.summary: Check whether Evolution is the default mailer
key.description: Every time Evolution starts, check whether or not it is the default mailer.

key.name: composer-charset
key.summary: Default charset in which to compose messages
key.description: Default charset in which to compose messages.

key.name: composer-gallery-path
key.summary: Path where picture gallery should search for its content
key.description: This value can be an empty string, which means it'll use the system Picture folder, usually set to ~/Pictures. This folder will be also used when the set path is not pointing to the existent folder

key.name: composer-inline-spelling
key.summary: Spell check inline
key.description: Draw spelling error indicators on words as you type.

key.name: composer-magic-links
key.summary: Automatic link recognition
key.description: Recognize links in text and replace them.

key.name: composer-magic-smileys
key.summary: Automatic emoticon recognition
key.description: Recognize emoticons in text and replace them with images.

key.name: composer-message-attribution
key.summary: Attribute message
key.description: The text that is inserted when replying to a message, attributing the message to the original author

key.name: composer-message-forward
key.summary: Forward message
key.description: The text that is inserted when forwarding a message, saying that the forwarded message follows

key.name: composer-message-original
key.summary: Original message
key.description: The text that is inserted when replying to a message (top posting), saying that the original message follows

key.name: composer-group-reply-to-list
key.summary: Group Reply replies to list
key.description: Instead of the normal "Reply to All" behaviour, this option will make the 'Group Reply' toolbar button try to reply only to the mailing list through which you happened to receive the copy of the message to which you're replying.

key.name: composer-reply-start-bottom
key.summary: Put the cursor at the bottom of replies
key.description: Users get all up in arms over where the cursor should go when replying to a message. This determines whether the cursor is placed at the top of the message or the bottom.

key.name: composer-request-receipt
key.summary: Always request read receipt
key.description: Whether a read receipt request gets added to every message by default.

key.name: composer-send-html
key.summary: Send HTML mail by default
key.description: Send HTML mail by default.

key.name: composer-spell-color
key.summary: Spell checking color
key.description: Underline color for misspelled words when using inline spelling.

key.name: composer-spell-languages
key.summary: Spell checking languages
key.description: List of dictionary language codes used for spell checking.

key.name: composer-show-bcc
key.summary: Show "Bcc" field when sending a mail message
key.description: Show the "Bcc" field when sending a mail message. This is controlled from the View menu when a mail account is chosen.

key.name: composer-show-cc
key.summary: Show "Cc" field when sending a mail message
key.description: Show the "Cc" field when sending a mail message. This is controlled from the View menu when a mail account is chosen.

key.name: composer-show-reply-to
key.summary: Show "Reply To" field when sending a mail message
key.description: Show the "Reply To" field when sending a mail message. This is controlled from the View menu when a mail account is chosen.

key.name: composer-show-post-from
key.summary: Show "From" field when posting to a newsgroup
key.description: Show the "From" field when posting to a newsgroup. This is controlled from the View menu when a news account is chosen.

key.name: composer-show-post-reply-to
key.summary: Show "Reply To" field when posting to a newsgroup
key.description: Show the "Reply To" field when posting to a newsgroup. This is controlled from the View menu when a news account is chosen.

key.name: composer-sign-reply-if-signed
key.summary: Digitally sign replies when the original message is signed
key.description: Automatically enable PGP or S/MIME signatures when replying to a message which is also PGP or S/MIME signed.

key.name: composer-outlook-filenames
key.summary: Encode filenames in an Outlook/GMail way
key.description: Encode filenames in the mail headers same as Outlook or GMail do, to let them display correctly filenames with UTF-8 letters sent by Evolution, because they do not follow the RFC 2231, but use the incorrect RFC 2047 standard.

key.name: composer-top-signature
key.summary: Put personalized signatures at the top of replies
key.description: Users get all up in arms over where their signature should go when replying to a message. This determines whether the signature is placed at the top of the message or the bottom.

key.name: composer-no-signature-delim
key.summary: Do not add signature delimiter
key.description: Set to TRUE in case you do not want to add signature delimiter before your signature when composing a mail.

key.name: composer-ignore-list-reply-to
key.summary: Ignore list Reply-To:
key.description: Some mailing lists set a Reply-To: header to trick users into sending replies to the list, even when they ask Evolution to make a private reply. Setting this option to TRUE will attempt to ignore such Reply-To: headers, so that Evolution will do as you ask it. If you use the private reply action, it will reply privately, while if you use the 'Reply to List' action it will do that. It works by comparing the Reply-To: header with a List-Post: header, if there is one.

key.name: composer-localized-re
key.summary: List of localized 'Re'
key.description: Comma-separated list of localized 'Re' abbreviations to skip in a subject text when replying to a message, as an addition to the standard "Re" prefix. An example is 'SV,AV'.

key.name: drag-and-drop-save-file-format
key.summary: Save file format for drag-and-drop operation
key.description: Can be either 'mbox' or 'pdf'.

key.name: show-animated-images
key.summary: Show image animations
key.description: Enable animated images in HTML mail. Many users find animated images annoying and prefer to see a static image instead.

key.name: side-bar-search
key.summary: Enable or disable type ahead search feature
key.description: Enable the side bar search feature to allow interactive searching of folder names.

key.name: magic-spacebar
key.summary: Enable or disable magic space bar
key.description: Enable this to use Space bar key to scroll in message preview, message list and folders.

key.name: global-view-setting
key.summary: Enable to use a similar message list view settings for all folders
key.description: Enable to use a similar message list view settings for all folders.

key.name: mark-citations
key.summary: Mark citations in the message "Preview"
key.description: Mark citations in the message "Preview".

key.name: citation-color
key.summary: Citation highlight color
key.description: Citation highlight color.

key.name: caret-mode
key.summary: Enable/disable caret mode
key.description: Enable caret mode, so that you can see a cursor when reading mail.

key.name: charset
key.summary: Default charset in which to display messages
key.description: Default charset in which to display messages.

key.name: image-loading-policy
key.summary: Automatically load images for HTML messages over HTTP

key.name: animate-images
key.summary: Show Animations
key.description: Show animated images as animations.

key.name: show-all-headers
key.summary: Show all message headers
key.description: Show all the headers when viewing a messages.

key.name: show-headers
key.default: [('From', true), ('Reply-To', true), ('To', true), ('Cc', true), ('Bcc', true), ('Subject', true), ('Date', true), ('Newsgroups', true), ('Face', true), ('x-evolution-mailer', false)]
key.summary: List of headers to show when viewing a message.
key.description: Each header is represented as a pair: the header name, and a boolean indicating whether the header is enabled. Disabled headers are not shown when viewing a message, but are still listed in Preferences.

key.name: show-sender-photo
key.summary: Show photo of the sender
key.description: Show the photo of the sender in the message reading pane.

key.name: mark-seen
key.summary: Mark as Seen after specified timeout
key.description: Mark as Seen after specified timeout.

key.name: mark-seen-timeout
key.summary: Timeout for marking messages as seen
key.description: Timeout in milliseconds for marking messages as seen.

key.name: show-email
key.summary: Sender email-address column in the message list
key.description: Show the email-address of the sender in a separate column in the message list.

key.name: vertical-view-fonts
key.summary: Determines whether to use the same fonts for both "From" and "Subject" lines in the "Messages" column in vertical view
key.description: Determines whether to use the same fonts for both "From" and "Subject" lines in the "Messages" column in vertical view.

key.name: show-deleted
key.summary: Show deleted messages in the message-list
key.description: Show deleted messages (with a strike-through) in the message-list.

key.name: enable-unmatched
key.summary: Enable Unmatched search folder
key.description: Enable Unmatched search folder within Search Folders. It does nothing if Search Folders are disabled.

key.name: safe-list
key.summary: Hides the per-folder preview and removes the selection
key.description: This key is read only once and reset to "false" after read. This unselects the mail in the list and removes the preview for that folder.

key.name: paned-size
key.summary: Height of the message-list pane
key.description: Height of the message-list pane.

key.name: headers-collapsed
key.summary: Whether message headers are collapsed in the user interface

key.name: hpaned-size
key.summary: Width of the message-list pane
key.description: Width of the message-list pane.

key.name: layout
key.summary: Layout style
key.description: The layout style determines where to place the preview pane in relation to the message list. "0" (Classic View) places the preview pane below the message list. "1" (Vertical View) places the preview pane next to the message list.

key.name: variable-width-font
key.summary: Variable width font
key.description: The variable width font for mail display.

key.name: monospace-font
key.summary: Terminal font
key.description: The terminal font for mail display.

key.name: use-custom-font
key.summary: Use custom fonts
key.description: Use custom fonts for displaying mail.

key.name: address-compress
key.summary: Compress display of addresses in TO/CC/BCC
key.description: Compress display of addresses in TO/CC/BCC to the number specified in address_count.

key.name: address-count
key.summary: Number of addresses to display in TO/CC/BCC
key.description: This sets the number of addresses to show in default message list view, beyond which a '...' is shown.

key.name: thread-subject
key.summary: Thread the message-list based on Subject
key.description: Whether or not to fall back on threading by subjects when the messages do not contain In-Reply-To or References headers.

key.name: thread-expand
key.summary: Default value for thread expand state
key.description: This setting specifies whether the threads should be in expanded or collapsed state by default. Evolution requires a restart.

key.name: thread-latest
key.summary: Whether sort threads based on latest message in that thread
key.description: This setting specifies whether the threads should be sorted based on latest message in each thread, rather than by message's date. Evolution requires a restart.

key.name: sort-accounts-alpha
key.summary: Sort accounts alphabetically in a folder tree
key.description: Tells how to sort accounts in a folder tree used in a Mail view. When set to true accounts are sorted alphabetically, with an exception of On This Computer and Search folders, otherwise accounts are sorted based on an order given by a user

key.name: filters-log-actions
key.summary: Log filter actions
key.description: Log filter actions to the specified log file.

key.name: filters-log-file
key.summary: Logfile to log filter actions
key.description: Logfile to log filter actions.

key.name: flush-outbox
key.summary: Flush Outbox after filtering
key.description: Whether to flush Outbox after filtering is done. Outbox flush will happen only when there was used any 'Forward to' filter action and approximately one minute after the last action invocation.

key.name: forward-style-name
key.summary: Default forward style

key.name: reply-style-name
key.summary: Default reply style

key.name: prompt-on-empty-subject
key.summary: Prompt on empty subject
key.description: Prompt the user when he or she tries to send a message without a Subject.

key.name: prompt-on-empty-trash
key.summary: Prompt when emptying the trash
key.description: Prompt the user when he or she tries to empty the trash.

key.name: prompt-on-expunge
key.summary: Prompt when user expunges
key.description: Prompt the user when he or she tries to expunge a folder.

key.name: prompt-on-invalid-recip
key.summary: Prompt before sending to recipients not entered as mail addresses
key.description: It disables/enables the repeated prompts to warn that you are trying to send a message to recipients not entered as mail addresses

key.name: prompt-on-only-bcc
key.summary: Prompt when user only fills Bcc
key.description: Prompt when user tries to send a message with no To or Cc recipients.

key.name: prompt-on-unwanted-html
key.summary: Prompt when user tries to send unwanted HTML
key.description: Prompt when user tries to send HTML mail to recipients that may not want to receive HTML mail.

key.name: prompt-on-open-many
key.summary: Prompt when user tries to open 10 or more messages at once
key.description: If a user tries to open 10 or more messages at one time, ask the user if they really want to do it.

key.name: prompt-on-mark-all-read
key.summary: Prompt while marking multiple messages
key.description: Enable or disable the prompt whilst marking multiple messages.

key.name: prompt-on-delete-in-vfolder
key.summary: Prompt when deleting messages in search folder
key.description: It disables/enables the repeated prompts to warn that deleting messages from a search folder permanently deletes the message, not simply removing it from the search results.

key.name: prompt-on-folder-drop-copy
key.summary: Asks whether to copy a folder by drag & drop in the folder tree
key.description: Possible values are: 'never' - do not allow copy with drag & drop of folders in folder tree, 'always' - allow copy with drag & drop of folders in folder tree without asking, or 'ask' - (or any other value) will ask user.

key.name: prompt-on-folder-drop-move
key.summary: Asks whether to move a folder by drag & drop in the folder tree
key.description: Possible values are: 'never' - do not allow move with drag & drop of folders in folder tree, 'always' - allow move with drag & drop of folders in folder tree without asking, or 'ask' - (or any other value) will ask user.

key.name: prompt-on-private-list-reply
key.summary: Prompt when replying privately to list messages
key.description: It disables/enables the repeated prompts to warn that you are sending a private reply to a message which arrived via a mailing list.

key.name: prompt-on-list-reply-to
key.summary: Prompt when mailing list hijacks private replies
key.description: It disables/enables the repeated prompts to warn that you are trying sending a private reply to a message which arrived via a mailing list, but the list sets a Reply-To: header which redirects your reply back to the list

key.name: prompt-on-reply-many-recips
key.summary: Prompt when replying to many recipients
key.description: It disables/enables the repeated prompts to warn that you are sending a reply to many people.

key.name: browser-close-on-reply-policy
key.summary: Policy for automatically closing the message browser window when forwarding or replying to the displayed message.

key.name: trash-empty-on-exit
key.summary: Empty Trash folders on exit
key.description: Empty all Trash folders when exiting Evolution.

key.name: trash-empty-on-exit-days
key.summary: Minimum days between emptying the trash on exit
key.description: Minimum time between emptying the trash on exit, in days.

key.name: trash-empty-date
key.summary: Last time Empty Trash was run
key.description: The last time Empty Trash was run, in days since January 1st, 1970 (Epoch).

key.name: error-timeout
key.summary: Amount of time in seconds the error should be shown on the status bar.
key.description: Amount of time in seconds the error should be shown on the status bar.

key.name: error-level
key.summary: Level beyond which the message should be logged.
key.description: This can have three possible values. "0" for errors. "1" for warnings. "2" for debug messages.

key.name: show-real-date
key.summary: Show original "Date" header value.
key.description: Show the original "Date" header (with a local time only if the time zone differs). Otherwise always show "Date" header value in a user preferred format and local time zone.

key.name: labels
key.summary: List of Labels and their associated colors
key.description: List of labels known to the mail component of Evolution. The list contains strings containing name:color where color uses the HTML hex encoding.

key.name: junk-check-incoming
key.summary: Check incoming mail being junk
key.description: Run junk test on incoming mail.

key.name: junk-empty-on-exit
key.summary: Empty Junk folders on exit
key.description: Empty all Junk folders when exiting Evolution.

key.name: junk-empty-on-exit-days
key.summary: Minimum days between emptying the junk on exit
key.description: Minimum time between emptying the junk on exit, in days.

key.name: junk-empty-date
key.summary: Last time Empty Junk was run
key.description: The last time Empty Junk was run, in days since January 1st, 1970 (Epoch).

key.name: junk-default-plugin
key.summary: The default plugin for Junk hook
key.description: This is the default junk plugin, even though there are multiple plugins enabled. If the default listed plugin is disabled, then it won't fall back to the other available plugins.

key.name: junk-lookup-addressbook
key.summary: Determines whether to lookup in address book for sender email
key.description: Determines whether to lookup the sender email in address book. If found, it shouldn't be a spam. It looks up in the books marked for autocompletion. It can be slow, if remote address books (like LDAP) are marked for autocompletion.

key.name: junk-lookup-addressbook-local-only
key.summary: Determines whether to look up addresses for junk filtering in local address book only
key.description: This option is related to the key lookup_addressbook and is used to determine whether to look up addresses in local address book only to exclude mail sent by known contacts from junk filtering.

key.name: junk-check-custom-header
key.summary: Determines whether to use custom headers to check for junk
key.description: Determines whether to use custom headers to check for junk. If this option is enabled and the headers are mentioned, it will be improve the junk checking speed.

key.name: junk-custom-header
key.summary: Custom headers to use while checking for junk.
key.description: Custom headers to use while checking for junk. The list elements are string in the format "headername=value".

key.name: default-account
key.summary: UID string of the default account.
key.description: UID string of the default account.

key.name: save-dir
key.summary: Save directory
key.description: Directory for saving mail component files.

key.name: composer-current-folder
key.summary: Composer load/attach directory
key.description: Directory for loading/attaching files to composer.

key.name: send-recv-on-start
key.summary: Check for new messages on start
key.description: Whether to check for new messages when Evolution is started. This includes also sending messages from Outbox.

key.name: send-recv-all-on-start
key.summary: Check for new messages in all active accounts
key.description: Whether to check for new messages in all active accounts regardless of the account "Check for new messages every X minutes" option when Evolution is started. This option is used only together with 'send_recv_on_start' option.

key.name: sync-interval
key.summary: Server synchronization interval
key.description: Controls how frequently local changes are synchronized with the remote mail server. The interval must be at least 30 seconds.

key.name: forward-style
key.summary: (Deprecated) Default forward style
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use "forward-style-name" instead.

key.name: reply-style
key.summary: (Deprecated) Default reply style
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use "reply-style-name" instead.

key.name: headers
key.summary: (Deprecated) List of custom headers and whether they are enabled.
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use "show-headers" instead.

key.name: load-http-images
key.summary: (Deprecated) Load images for HTML messages over HTTP
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use "image-loading-policy" instead.

key.name: prompt-on-reply-close-browser
key.summary: (Deprecated) Asks whether to close the message window when the user forwards or replies to the message shown in the window
key.description: This key was deprecated in version 3.10 and should no longer be used. Use "browser-close-on-reply-policy" instead.
